com.facebook.ads

Interface FullScreenAd

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Ad
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InterstitialAd, RewardedVideoAd

    public interface FullScreenAd
extends Ad
    FullScreenAd is a common interface that is implemented by all fullscreen ads.
    Since:
    5.6

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  FullScreenAd.ShowAdConfig
      Marker interface for an object that represents an ad show config.
      static interface  FullScreenAd.ShowConfigBuilder
      Builder that allows to configure an ad showing.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.facebook.ads.Ad

        Ad.LoadAdConfig, Ad.LoadConfigBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ad.LoadConfigBuilder buildLoadAdConfig()
      Returns LoadConfigBuilder that allows to specify ad loading parameters.
      FullScreenAd.ShowConfigBuilder buildShowAdConfig()
      Returns FullScreenAd.ShowConfigBuilder that allows to specify ad showing parameters.
      boolean show() 

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.ads.Ad

        destroy, getPlacementId, isAdInvalidated, loadAd, loadAdFromBid, setExtraHints

    • Method Detail

      • show

        boolean show()

      • buildLoadAdConfig

        Ad.LoadConfigBuilder buildLoadAdConfig()
        Returns LoadConfigBuilder that allows to specify ad loading parameters. You should call Ad.loadAd() after all parameters have been set.
        Returns:
        builder that allows to configure ad loading
        Since:
        5.6

      • buildShowAdConfig

        FullScreenAd.ShowConfigBuilder buildShowAdConfig()
        Returns FullScreenAd.ShowConfigBuilder that allows to specify ad showing parameters. You should call show() after all parameters have been set.
        Returns:
        builder that allows to configure ad showing
        Since:
        5.6
